Basic idea the choice between:

A)
Money first system: Modern Capitalism - unified economical model with sustainable growth, unified world political system, competitive orbital security system
External (and virutual) Slavery

Research - Roman Empire

B)
Human first system: Capitalism in capital projects, Socialism in Society, different every region based on geographical and historical backgrounds. Competitive regional political system, unfied orbital security system
Esternal Feodalism

Research - Roman Holy Empire

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xYA7YVPCfww
